title: Get Your Own Team Fat Apron - Cooking With Greggy Merch!
description:
The entire month of October, you can subscribe to the http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny Fan Mail tier and get your own Team Fat apron and note from Greg -- plus early access to our shows!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
